tool.name: BWA-MEM mapper
tool.command: #if not $ref.isindexed: ln -s $reference ref.fa && bwa index ref.fa && #end if bwa mem #if $ref.isindexed: $ref.index.fields.path #else ref.fa #end if $input1 #if $reads.paired: $input2 #end if > $output

param.name: isindexed
param.label: Will you select a reference genome from your history or use a built-in index?

param.name: reference
param.label: Select a reference from your history

param.name: input1
param.label: FASTQ file
param.help: FASTQ with either Sanger-scaled quality values (fastqsanger) or Illumina-scaled quality values (fastqillumina)

param.name: input1
param.label: Forward FASTQ file
param.help: FASTQ with either Sanger-scaled quality values (fastqsanger) or Illumina-scaled quality values (fastqillumina)

param.name: input2
param.label: Reverse FASTQ file
param.help: FASTQ with either Sanger-scaled quality values (fastqsanger) or Illumina-scaled quality values (fastqillumina)
